channel.description: Recent content in tableau Tutorial on

item.title: Getting started with tableau
item.description: Installation # Tableau offers a 2 week free trial for all of their licensed products. Tableau also offers licenses to Students for free here and nearly free Desktop licenses for non-profit organizations here. To get started with a free trial, navigate to Tableau Products to see a list of their offerings which include: Desktop for design and analysis Server for sharing visualizations throughout an organization. Reader for read only Public, a Desktop product that is limited to saving on Tableau’s public server Desktop products will run on Mac OS and Windows 32 and 64-bit versions.

item.title: Data Visualization with Tableau
item.description: what is data visualization? # Data Visualization is an art of presenting the data in a manner that even a non-analyst can understand it. A perfect blend of aesthetic elements like colors, dimensions, labels can create visual masterpieces, hence revealing surprising business insights which in turn helps businesses to make informed decisions.
